attributes.comment:
The increase is too much and not acceptable, especially for I-131 and I-765, not
much work is needed for these kinds of applications. Plus it is only issued for a
year, so the applicant HAS TO reapply them every year, which is added work and
waste of money for both parties. For I-485 application, most of the lucky people
are getting their background check cleared in a timely manner. For those who are
unlucky, it takes years. And I don't believe increasing the fee will bring them
anything earlier. I am one of the unlucky ones, with background check pending for
2 years and still waiting. I am strongly oppose this kind of rate increase!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
